file.desc: set the limit file size in bytes

file.desc: set the start time offset relative to EOF

file.desc: set the recording timestamp ('now' to set the current time)

file.desc: reinit filtergraph on input parameter changes

global.name: -max_alloc

global.desc: ratio of decoding errors (0.0: no errors, 1.0: 100% errors) above which ffmpeg returns an error instead of success.

subtitle.desc: set the subtitle options to the indicated preset

video.desc: set frame rate (Hz value, fraction or abbreviation)

video.desc: set max frame rate (Hz value, fraction or abbreviation)
